name: nemo

datasource.data_def: {label: "data", data: d1, lines: { show: true }, color: "rgb(200,0,0)"}

plots.options: legend: { position: "nw"}, xaxis: { axisLabel: "x"}, yaxis: { axisLabel: "y"}
plots.title: basic

description: Nemo is a forward-time, individual-based, genetically explicit, and stochastic simulation program designed to study the evolution of life history/phenotypic traits and population genetics in a flexible (meta-)population framework.
